snippet: The Arthur L. Loeb Cup was played on Tuesday morning. There were 90 pairs competing, many of whom were pro-am partnerships.
lead_paragraph: The Arthur L. Loeb Cup was played on Tuesday morning. There were 90 pairs competing, many of whom were pro-am partnerships.

headline.main: A Suit Yields a Telling Effect on the Play in Another Suit

headline.seo: Bridge: A Suit Break Affects the Odds
